author: Goran Flegar
message:
Move Executor vtables to single link unit

The basic executor functionality has been moved from `ginkgo`
to `ginkgo_{cpu|gpu|reference}` modules.
Since both the dummy versions, as well as the real version of
these libraries have to compile the same basic method
implementations, these have been extracted into object libraries
"`ginkgo_{cpu|gpu|reference}_device`, which are then "baked" into the
corresponding dummy/real module at compile time.
